title: Iran releases currency exchange rates for November 22
description:
BAKU, Azerbaijan, November 22. The Central Bank of Iran (CBI) has released the official exchange rates for foreign currencies as of November 22, Trend reports.

According to the CBI's announced rates, the value of 27 currencies went up, while 17 currencies fell compared to November 20.

The official...

title: Uzbekistan, Lithuania set fresh priorities to deepen economic cooperation
description:
TASHKENT, Uzbekistan, November 28. Uzbekistan and Lithuania recognized the steady growth of their partnership and agreed to think outside the box, focusing on a few key areas that could really move the needle, Trend reports via the Ministry of Investment, Industry, and Trade of Uzbekistan.

title: Uzbekistan, Iran’s Mazandaran province strengthen trade, economic ties
description:
TEHRAN- Fariduddin Nasriev, the ambassador of Uzbekistan to Iran, visited Sari, the capital of Iran's northern Mazandaran Province.

During the visit, the ambassador held meetings with Mazandaran's Governor-General, Mehdi Younesi; and also, Ali Taghipour, Head of the Mazandaran Chamber of Commerce, ...
